item.witcher_rpg.silver_witcher_swords.d: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets, scaling with attack damage.
item.witcher_rpg.aerondight_sword.descri: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets, scaling with their max health.
The blade charges up with every hit (max. 10 charges).
Gaining damage, spell crit chance and spell crit damage.
When fully charged, deals magic damage per hit.
effect.witcher_rpg.aerondight_charge.des: Increases attack damage, spell crit chance & spell crit damage per stack.
effect.witcher_rpg.quen_shield.descripti: Gives absorption and clears negative status effects.
effect.witcher_rpg.yrden_circle.descript: Reduces movement speed and damages undead targets.
effect.witcher_rpg.axii.description: Incapacitates the target and makes it mor vulnerable to damage.
effect.witcher_rpg.adrenaline_gain.descr: Increases attack damage and sign intensity per stack.
effect.witcher_rpg.quen_explode.descript: Gives absorption and reflects some of the damage back to the attacker.
effect.witcher_rpg.aard_intensity.descri: Increases the damage of the Aard Sign.
effect.witcher_rpg.axii_intensity.descri: Increases the damage of the Axii Sign.
effect.witcher_rpg.igni_intensity.descri: Increases the damage of the Igni Sign.
effect.witcher_rpg.quen_intensity.descri: Increases the damage of the Quen Sign.
effect.witcher_rpg.yrden_intensity.descr: Increases the damage of the Yrden Sign.
effect.witcher_rpg.axii_puppet.descripti: Makes a hostile monster your ally for a short tim and buffs its attack damage.
effect.witcher_rpg.battle_trance.descrip: Gain Movement Speed and deal 10% more melee damage for each Adrenaline Amplifier.
effect.witcher_rpg.fast_attack.descripti: Boosts Attack Speed, Reduces Attack Damage. (Cant be used with Strong Attack)
effect.witcher_rpg.strong_attack.descrip: Boosts Attack Damage, Reduces Attack Speed. (Cant be used with Fast Attack)
effect.witcher_rpg.quen_active.descripti: Gives absorption and clears negative status effects, will be removed when no absorption hearts are active.
effect.witcher_rpg.sign_intensity.descri: Increases the damage of all Signs.
spell.witcher_rpg.quen.name: Quen
spell.witcher_rpg.quen.description: Gives you a absorption effect for {effect_duration} seconds and clears all negative status effects.
spell.witcher_rpg.quen_active_shield.des: Active shield that, clears negative effects, gives absorption and heals 50% of received damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.yrden.name: Yrden
spell.witcher_rpg.yrden.description: Slows enemies for {cloud_duration} seconds, trapping and damaging undead creatures.
spell.witcher_rpg.yrden_magic_trap.name: Yrden Magic Trap
spell.witcher_rpg.yrden_magic_trap.descr: Spawns a Yrden Glyph for {duration} seconds, destroys projectiles, damages and slows enemies.
spell.witcher_rpg.igni.name: Igni
spell.witcher_rpg.igni.description: Compromised pyrokinetic burst that ignites enemies and deals {damage} sign-damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.aard.name: Aard
spell.witcher_rpg.aard.description: Telekinetic thrust that knocks targets back and deals {damage} sign-damage around the caster.
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_sweep.name: Aard Sweep
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_sweep.description: Telekinetic thrust that knocks targets back and deals {damage} sign-damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.axii.name: Axii
spell.witcher_rpg.axii.description: Makes the target incapacitated and more vulnerable for damage for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.witcher_rpg.axii_puppet.name: Axii Puppet
spell.witcher_rpg.axii_puppet.descriptio: Makes a hostile monster your ally for a short tim and buffs its attack damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_sweep_frost.name: Aard Frost Sweep
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_sweep_frost.descr: Deals {damage}_0 lightning- and {damage}_1 frost-damage in a 360 radius,chance to freeze targets solid.
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_frost.name: Aard Frost Sweep
spell.witcher_rpg.aard_frost.description: Deals {damage}_0 lightning- and {damage}_1 frost-damage, frosts targets.
spell.witcher_rpg.igni_firestream.name: Igni Fire-stream
spell.witcher_rpg.rend.name: Rend
spell.witcher_rpg.rend.description: Heavy strike that deals {damage} physical-damage, scales with adrenaline.
spell.witcher_rpg.strong_attack.name: Strong Attack
spell.witcher_rpg.strong_attack.descript: Strong attack with the sword, deals {damage} physical-damage.
spell.witcher_rpg.crippling_strike.name: Crippling Strike
spell.witcher_rpg.crippling_strike.descr: Fast strike, deals {damage} physical-damage and cripples the targets.
spell.witcher_rpg.whirl.name: Whirl
spell.witcher_rpg.whirl.description: Spinning and dealing {damage} physical-damage. The more adrenaline you have, the faster you move.
spell.witcher_rpg.signs_change_form.name: Alternate Sign Mode
spell.witcher_rpg.signs_change_form.desc: Gives the caster access to a alternate Witcher Sign for {effect_duration} s.
spell.witcher_rpg.battle_trance.name: Battle Trance
spell.witcher_rpg.battle_trance.descript: Gain Movement Speed and deal 10 percent more melee damage for each Adrenaline Amplifier for {effect_duration} s.
spell.witcher_rpg.defensive_witcher_mech: Block attacks and Arrows for a short time frame.
advancements.more_rpg_content.silver_swo: How do you like that silver?
advancements.more_rpg_content.steel_swor: You'll choke to death on 3 pounds of steel!
advancements.more_rpg_content.aerondight: For centuries it lays in these depths, waiting for you.
advancements.rpg_classes.kaer_morhen_arm: Obtain all Kaer Morhen Set parts.
enchantment.witcher_rpg.signs.desc: Increases all kinds of sign spell damage you deal
